attributes.action: Make it a legal requirement to upload photo I’d for social media accounts uk
attributes.additional_details: It’s a hard place for teenagers, I believe changing the law on social media would make a huge difference. It would stop fake accounts and trolling as people would think about what they was doing if they wasn’t anonymous. People would also be able to be hold accountable for bad behaviour on social media.
attributes.background: Start making a change to make social media a safer place especially for teenagers and young peoole

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition which calls for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/650995
